snippet.title: Heli Attack 3 (Full Gameplay)
snippet.description:
Ah, yes. The nostalgia is strong with this one! I remember back in 2005, playing this game for hours on end. It was exciting dodging bullets and unlocking many creative weapons.

The people of SquareCircleCo had really knocked it out of the park with this one. So much detail and intense gameplay for a game that was distributed for free. But it inspired so many people like me to pursue creative hobbies of our own. And for that, we are grateful!

Watch me shoot down all those helis and give the final level my best shot! Rest in peace, Flash!
